programme.title: Live Monday Night Football
programme.desc: Leicester City v Liverpool (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the Premier League encounter at the King Power Stadium, as the Reds look for three points against the struggling champions. The Foxes have endured an agonising season so far, following the ecstasy of their totally unexpected triumph in 2015/16. Jurgen Klopp's Reds were fighting for the title early in the campaign, however a dreadful run in the first part of 2017 - which saw them fail to win in January - has virtually ended their challenge.(n)

programme.title: Fiorentina - Torino 27/02
programme.desc: Cod. 401777. Serie A. 26a giornata. Collegamento ore 20:00 con Prepartita. Viola imbattuti al Franchi nelle 12 partite di questo campionato con 6 vittorie e 6 pareggi. Il Torino non vince in trasferte ufficiali da novembre (0-2 a Crotone), poi 2 pareggi e 5 sconfitte. I granata a Firenze non battono i viola in serie A dal 1976 (0-1), da allora 12 pareggi e 14 sconfitte. Commento: Marinozzi-Marchegiani(n)
